articles.title: Gun Restriction Bill Passes House With Help of Republicans - Newsweek
articles.description: "[Americans] are begging us to protect them and their loved ones from gun violence, who among us will answer their call?" asked Representative Jerry Nadler.
articles.content: Responding to a recent wave of mass shootings, the House of Representatives passed a bill raising the age to purchase semiautomatic rifles to 21, requiring safe firearms storage, while seeking to cra… [+3547 chars]
